org.opends.server.tools.dsreplication

Class InitializeReplicationUserData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.tools.dsreplication.ReplicationUserData
      • org.opends.server.tools.dsreplication.InitializeReplicationUserData

  • public class InitializeReplicationUserData
extends ReplicationUserData
    This class is used to store the information provided by the user to initialize replication. It is required because when we are in interactive mode the ReplicationCliArgumentParser is not enough.
